forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
